db:info.db:title: Twitter Timeline Example
db:info.db:edition: Qt Network Authorization | Commercial or GPLv3

db:abstract.db:para: Demonstrates authenticating with OAuth to access a Twitter timeline.

db:article.db:para: The Twitter Timeline example uses OAuth, as supported by Qt Network Authorization, to sign in to Twitter and display a timeline of tweets (in text format) associated with the authenticated user.

To use this example, a consumer key and secret from Twitter are needed. To register the application visit https://apps.twitter.com. Youâ€™ll need to add http://127.0.0.1:1337/callback as a callback URL in your Twitter app settings.

db:section.db:title: Running the Example
db:section.db:para: To run the example from Qt Creator, open the Welcome mode and select the example from Examples. For more information, visit Building and Running an Example.
